data.text: @catdolrec Grandkidâ€™s classes at school. The FB group sharing shows  like 1/2 of a few teams are positive this week. Same with my kids that work in Ed. Lots out after weekend games etc. True that NSgov has no tracking and could care less.

@nsgov Genuine question, for anybody that wants the mandates and masks to continue, where do you see the end?? Covid isn't going anywhere and is here to stay so where do you draw the line for mandates etc?? Again it's a genuine question and not to ruffle feathers
@Pat_4_NSians Hi, where do you find your information? This PC government is covering up and I have a hard time getting information on covid cases.

@haligonian96 @nsgov Not a choice when people are forced into a workplace with large groups of mostly maskless and up to 50%+ unvaccinated depending on age and the area. #nspoli #COVID19NS #hfxpoli #cbpoli #nstu #nsed

@Reifromspace @Watchingthenew3 @HinoMitaka @nsgov @TimHoustonNS N95. The number represents the % of particles the masks filters. An N95 from Home Depot filters the same % as the N95 masks they use at the hospital. The difference is fit. HCW have to make sure their masks are well fitted (I assume they have a procedure to check).
@annwmac @Watchingthenew3 @HinoMitaka @nsgov @TimHoustonNS Where are the n-95s that are medical grade?
